title: Looking to get my first OJ/19th century card
author: ChasingPaper

posts.post_title: Looking to get my first OJ/19th century card
posts.post_content:
Ive been in the hobby since I was a kid, lots of vintage, but have never had a card from the 19th century. 

Id like for it to be a player for Chicago, but Boston, Phila, Indianapolis, Detroit would do as well.
Looking for a pose where the player has a bat or is in a pose to throw or catch with the ball in frame. Huge visible mustache a plus.

Low grade, image not faded out. $2-$500 max.

Have a Jack Rowe, Detroit posted below, which has all of what you are looking for Batting with a ball visible and a mustache. Nice dark image.  

Will do $450 for you check, MO or zelle

[url]https://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=339621[/url]
Thanks for the reply. I would have taken the Ferguson for sure. Thats an awesome looking card. The bottom of the Rowe is basically missing, being badly miscut so I will have to pass.
